title: New Discussion Facility on the St. Louis Conference Site
post: Did Occam say anything about the multiplication of Forums? I hope we don’t split into lots of little subgroups, many of which will overlap and have us clicking from forum to forum in the hope of tracking down elusive new ideas. At the moment I find nearly everything on this one, with occasional peeks at Colin and Stephen Jones, just to see what they’re up to; I hope nothing too earth-shattering diverts us all from shroudstory to stlouisshroudconference.
author: Hugh Farey
